title: Cupcakes of Doom!: A Collection of YARG! Piratey Comics
description: It's the ultimate showdown, Our Heroic-ish Pirates versus Those Lousy Vikings to decide the fate of a kingdom! Who will be the victorious, bearded, giant-hat-wearing masters of the sea? Their weapons of choice? BAKED GOODS! Deliciously-Evil Viking Pie, a threat to their homemade pirate cookies, forces Captain Scurvybeard and crew to embark on a quest to find the ultimate The long lost CUPCAKES OF DOOM! It gets rather silly.
author: Ray Friesen
